reasoning: Dual photon cannon system with animated 'scrambled energy ball' effect. While the visual effect is non-trivial, all patterns exist in the codebase - particle systems (VFXSystem/Explosion), glow effects (PhotonTorpedo), and Three.js materials. Changes contained to 3-5 files in single frontend service with no external dependencies or infrastructure changes.

scope.notes: Primary changes: PhotonTorpedo.ts (visual overhaul), Game.ts (dual firing logic), Player.ts (cannon position methods). Minor: ControlPanel.ts for naming updates.

integrations.notes: Uses existing Three.js library. Particle/animation patterns already exist in VFXSystem.ts (Explosion class) and current PhotonTorpedo glow effects.

infrastructure.notes: Pure frontend game logic changes. No build or deployment changes needed.

knowledge.notes: Codebase already has: particle systems (Explosion class in VFXSystem), glow effects (PhotonTorpedo), Three.js BufferGeometry animations. All needed patterns are established.

concerns: Trajectory math for converging fire paths needs precise angle calculations
Animated projectile performance with dual firing (2x projectiles)
Visual fidelity of 'scrambled energy ball' to match player expectations
risk.notes: Changes isolated to weapon system. Easy to test visually. No security or data concerns. Temporary breaks to firing are immediately visible and testable.

key_files.PhotonTorpedo.ts: Major rewrite - replace static sphere with animated scrambled particle/pixel effect
key_files.Game.ts: Modify fireTorpedo() to fire two projectiles from port/starboard positions with converging trajectories
key_files.Player.ts: Add methods to get port and starboard cannon positions relative to ship geometry
key_files.ControlPanel.ts: Update weapon naming from 'torpedo' to 'photon cannon' in messages

technical_approach.dual_firing: Calculate port (-X offset) and starboard (+X offset) positions from Player ship. Both aim toward screen center (crosshair position).
technical_approach.trajectory_math: Use atan2 to calculate angle from each cannon position to crosshair. Projectiles converge at crosshair distance.
technical_approach.scrambled_effect: Options: (1) Animated sprite with scrambling frames, (2) Particle system with chaotic motion, (3) Dynamic geometry with vertex jittering. Recommend particle-based for authentic 'energy ball' feel.

existing_patterns_to_leverage.VFXSystem_Explosion: Particle system with velocities, colors, and BufferGeometry - can adapt for projectile effect
existing_patterns_to_leverage.PhotonTorpedo_glow: Transparent overlapping spheres for glow - foundation for energy appearance
existing_patterns_to_leverage.Player_geometry: Wing positions at X offsets ±3 and ±4 (pixelSize 0.25) define cannon locations

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Frontend game visual/mechanics change with no security implications. Changes are immediately visible and manually testable. Unit tests for trajectory math calculations if they exist, but primary validation is visual gameplay testing.
